sql-statement.sql:
from crm_member_info o where 1=1 <% if(!isEmpty(id)){ %> and o.id like #'%$id$%'# <% } %><!--主键 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(memmernum)){ %> and o.memmernum like #'%$memmernum$%'# <% } %><!--会员卡号 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(memmername)){ %> and o.memmername like #'%$memmername$%'# <% } %><!--会员姓名 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(sex)){ %> and o.sex like #'%$sex$%'# <% } %><!--性别 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(phone)){ %> and o.phone like #'%$phone$%'# <% } %><!--手机号 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(memmbertype)){ %> and o.memmbertype like #'%$memmbertype$%'# <% } %><!--会员卡类型 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(status)){ %> and o.status like #'%$status$%'# <% } %><!--会员卡状态 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(members_point)){ %> and o.members_point like #'%$members_point$%'# <% } %><!--会员积分 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(money)){ %> and o.money like #'%$money$%'# <% } %><!--储值余额 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(remark)){ %> and o.remark like #'%$remark$%'# <% } %><!--备注 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(referee)){ %> and o.referee like #'%$referee$%'# <% } %><!--推荐人 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(wxnum)){ %> and o.wxnum like #'%$wxnum$%'# <% } %><!--微信号 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(openid)){ %> and o.openid like #'%$openid$%'# <% } %><!--微信openid -->
<% if(!isEmpty(qq)){ %> and o.qq like #'%$qq$%'# <% } %><!--QQ -->
<% if(!isEmpty(adress)){ %> and o.adress like #'%$adress$%'# <% } %><!--联系地址 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(idcard)){ %> and o.idcard like #'%$idcard$%'# <% } %><!--身份证 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(birthday)){ %> and o.birthday like #'%$birthday$%'# <% } %><!--生日 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(email)){ %> and o.email like #'%$email$%'# <% } %><!--邮箱 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(career)){ %> and o.career like #'%$career$%'# <% } %><!--职业 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(receiveid)){ %> and o.receiveid like #'%$receiveid$%'# <% } %><!--拓展人 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(tenant_id)){ %> and o.tenant_id like #'%$tenant_id$%'# <% } %><!--开卡门店 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(create_date)){ %> and o.create_date like #'%$create_date$%'# <% } %><!--创建时间 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(create_by)){ %> and o.create_by like #'%$create_by$%'# <% } %><!--创建人 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(update_date)){ %> and o.update_date like #'%$update_date$%'# <% } %><!--更新时间 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(update_by)){ %> and o.update_by like #'%$update_by$%'# <% } %><!--更新人 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(from_date)){ %> and o.from_date like #'%$from_date$%'# <% } %><!--起始日期 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(end_date)){ %> and o.end_date like #'%$end_date$%'# <% } %><!--终止日期 -->
<% if(!isEmpty(mempic)){ %> and o.mempic like #'%$mempic$%'# <% } %><!--会员图像 -->
